text: Harvey Lavan "Van" Cliburn Jr. (July 12, 1934 - February 27, 2013) was an American classical pianist. Cliburn was born in Shreveport, Louisiana on July 12, 1934. He moved to Kilgore, Texas at age six. He died on February 27, 2013 from bone cancer in Fort Worth, Texas, aged 78."Van Cliburn dies; American classical pianist was 78". Associated Press (via Fox News). February 27, 2013. As an honour, a street in Fort Worth, Texas was named after him. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American classical pianists Category:Cancer deaths in Texas Category:Deaths from bone cancer Category:Gay men Category:LGBT musicians Category:LGBT people from Louisiana Category:LGBT people from Texas Category:Musicians from Louisiana Category:Musicians from Texas Category:People from Shreveport, Louisiana
title: Van Cliburn
